description: Try our easy to follow Cheese Ball with Crackers & Vegetable Crudites recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cheese Ball with Crackers & Vegetable Crudites Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lebanese cucumber, cut into sticks (to serve)
1 stalk celery, cut into sticks (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine cream cheese, tasty cheese, gherkins, half the parsley, half the chives and Worcestershire sauce in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper.

Combine remaining parsley, remaining chives and walnuts in a bowl. Roll the cheese mixture into a ball. Coat cheese ball in walnut mixture, gently press on. Transfer to a plate. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate until required.
Serve cheese ball on a platter with crackers and vegetable sticks.
